name: Super Space Yumper
description:
This is my 2DPlatformer project.

Modifications:

1. Created new level 3

2. Created new level 4

3. Created boss enemies with faster move speed, bigger scale, more health, and a different color than other enemies, and some of them will drop keys to doors

4. Created new small enemies that can't die and have a different color; these enemies are to be used as a way to cross a dangerous section

5. Changed both levels 1 and 2 to be harder, but still not as hard as the following levels afterward

Credits:

Created by: Nicholas Aaltonen
